answers.answer: Ugh I just had the three hour test it sucked lol be prepared with a book or entertainment for three hours. But your baby is fine. You probably have gestational diabetes and they'll control it with diet

Not , the ob won't doe something that hurt you baby! I have to do 2  test  on different day.On the other side is good to know if everything is going okay with you and baby.I hope everything going well with you and baby. Wish you the best.

All this means is that you could have gestational diabetes, it won't harm your baby in any way, but COULD mean he/she could grow a little bit bigger before labor. The only downside to it is if you do have gestational diabetes, then  they may advise you to be induced a little earlier than full term if baby does happen to be on the bigger side.

question: So im 28 weeks pregnant and just got my Glucose test and it came back high...  there having me go back in for another three hour test ... can this hurt my baby what does it mean... I'm scared Im a ftm and freaking out
title: Help Freaking Out...
